titles.title: Supporting the designation of Destination ImagiNation Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
5/20/2008--Introduced.
Commends the students, teachers, schools, and volunteers who participate in the Destination ImagiNation program, which promotes students' development of creativity, teamwork, and problem solving skills. Encourages more teachers and schools to participate in the program. Supports the designation of Destination ImagiNation Week.
